mapper.select: SELECT id id, leader_id leaderId, user_id userId, CASE type_id WHEN '1' THEN '咨询' WHEN '5' THEN '建言' WHEN '2' THEN '投诉' WHEN '6' THEN '求助' WHEN '9' THEN '感谢' END typeId, field field, title title, left(passage,120) passage, ask_passage askPassage, extra_passage extraPassage, CASE is_process WHEN 'true' THEN '已回复' WHEN 'false' THEN '待回复' END isProcess, DATE_FORMAT( time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S' ) time FROM front_left_message where leader_id=#{id}

SELECT id id, leader_id leaderId, user_id userId, CASE type_id WHEN '1' THEN '咨询' WHEN '5' THEN '建言' WHEN '2' THEN '投诉' WHEN '6' THEN '求助' WHEN '9' THEN '感谢' END typeId, field field, title title, passage passage, ask_passage askPassage, extra_passage extraPassage, is_process isProcess, CASE is_process WHEN 'true' THEN '已回复' WHEN 'false' THEN '待回复' END isProcessAlias, DATE_FORMAT( time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S' ) time FROM front_left_message where id=#{id}

SELECT leftMessage.id id, user.username, leftMessage.field field, leftMessage.title title, LEFT ( leftMessage.passage, 55 ) passage FROM `front_left_message` leftMessage LEFT JOIN front_user_message USER ON leftMessage.user_id = USER.id WHERE leftMessage.type_id=#{typeId} and leftMessage.is_process='false' and leftMessage.leader_id=#{leaderId} order by leftMessage.time desc

SELECT leftMessage.id id, user.username, leftMessage.field field, leftMessage.title title, leftMessage.passage passage, leftMessage.response_passage responsePassage FROM `front_left_message` leftMessage LEFT JOIN front_user_message USER ON leftMessage.user_id = USER.id WHERE leftMessage.id=#{id}

SELECT leftMessage.id id, user.username, leftMessage.field field, leftMessage.title title, LEFT ( leftMessage.passage, 55 ) passage FROM `front_left_message` leftMessage LEFT JOIN front_user_message USER ON leftMessage.user_id = USER.id WHERE leftMessage.type_id=#{typeId} and leftMessage.is_process='true' and leftMessage.leader_id=#{leaderId} order by leftMessage.time desc
